hook: AI isn't just text anymore. It's seeing, hearing, and speaking. This week, we gave developers the full sensory stack.
body:
Shipping velocity is the only metric that matters in open source. This week, our team merged 40 PRs, effectively transforming pollinations.ai from a generation tool into a fully multimodal development platform.

Here is what that looks like in practice:

1. THE AUDIO REVOLUTION
We have integrated ElevenMusic for high-fidelity music generation and OVH Whisper for speech-to-text transcription. Developers can now build apps that listen and sing, not just read and write.

2. NEXT-GEN VIDEO
Video is the next frontier. We added LTX-2, Grok-Video, and Imagen-4. Whether you are building marketing tools or creative suites, the pipeline is ready.

3. RISE OF THE AGENTS
We are moving beyond simple prompts. With the OpenClaw integration and the new Polly Discord Bot source code, we are laying the groundwork for autonomous agents that can navigate the web and interact with communities.

4. UNIFIED DEV EXPERIENCE
Great models are useless without great documentation. We merged our Docs directly into the Play page. You can now read the manual and test the API in the exact same interface. Friction removed.

We are building the most accessible, transparent AI infrastructure on the web. No gatekeeping, just shipping.
